pkgmetadata.longdescription: Example Metabolomics Data Sets // Data sets from a variety of biological sample matrices, analysed using a number of mass spectrometry based metabolomic analytical techniques. The example data sets are stored remotely using GitHub releases https://github.com/aberHRML/metaboData/releases which can be accessed from R using the package. The package also includes the 'abr1' FIE-MS data set from the 'FIEmspro' package https://users.aber.ac.uk/jhd/ doi:10.1038/nprot.2007.511.
